alert.note: Alert for Price (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 17 at 3:25PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Price County through 345 PM CDT... At 325 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Prentice, or 25 miles southeast of Park Falls, moving southwest at 5 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Prentice around 345 PM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.
